remarks: Member of span of the singleton of a vector.  ( ~ elspansn analog.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspsn.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lspsn.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lspsn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsn.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lspsn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnel $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( U e. ( N ` { X } ) <-> E. k e. K U = ( k .x. X ) ) ) $.
$d .x. k $.
$d F k $.
$d K k $.
$d N k $.
$d U k $.
$d V k $.
$d W k $.
$d X k $.
